page.title: 04RECREATION
page.content:
Skittles have been going in the village of BURTLE 40 years it started in 1945.{MR HAYS }started the Burtle team of he was the Captain for 15 years untill he retired and { {MR.G.BAKER }took over .The team's name is the {RAILWAY BURTLE.} Each team has 7 players each player playing 7 hands of 3 balls =21 balls a player.Most balls are made from {Teak}from Burma and the pins are made from {AppleWood}.there are 9 Pins&3 Balls the avarage lengh of Skittle Alley is 15 meters.When it comes to a Final they play on a Nutral Alley.A Match can take up to TWO houres to Play.
{} {
